content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.reconorder') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconorder
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconorder (
[v1id] int,
[v1IDold] nvarchar(4000),
[v1COrderNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CustRef] nvarchar(4000),
[v1WaybillID] int,
[v1CustomerName] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Adres1] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Adres2] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Town1] nvarchar(4000),
[v1NoOfPcls] int,
[v1PickUpCustID] int,
[v1DeliverCustID] int,
[v1BillCustID] int,
[v1Weight] numeric(36,6),
[v1OValue] numeric(36,6),
[v1HODate] datetime2(7),
[v1CService] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CourierID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CustService] nvarchar(4000),
[v1oldID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1UserID] int,
[v1PCode] nvarchar(4000),
[v1Appointment] datetime2(7),
[v1DeliverBy] datetime2(7),
[v1DConfirmed] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DComment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DRefNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DUserID] int,
[v1NoPODs] int,
[v1DueDate] datetime2(7),
[v1BatchNo] int,
[v1CustAccID] int,
[v1Units] int,
[v1Airfreightflag] int,
[v1CustRef3] nvarchar(4000),
[v1SpecDel] int,
[v1FLUnits] int,
[v1FLKgs] int,
[v1InService] datetime2(7),
[v1CustDocs] int,
[v1Scanned] datetime2(7),
[v1ScanImageName1] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ScanImageName] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ChangeReasonID] int,
[v1Bill_ServiceType] int,
[v1Bill_VehicleType] int,
[v1Quote] numeric(36,6),
[v1ConsignLabel] int,
[v1Custref2] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CallProgID] int,
[v1CallProgUpdDate] datetime2(7),
[v1SubmitEDI] int,
[v1LastUpdate] datetime2(7),
[v1QuoteFlag] int,
[v1Bill_MinRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1Bill_AddRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1Bill_MinKG] numeric(36,6),
[v1Notes] nvarchar(4000),
[v1QuoteWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1OrderConsolidationID] int,
[v1QuoteFuelLevy] numeric(36,6),
[v1QuoteOtherSurcharges] numeric(36,6),
[v1QuoteDocFees] numeric(36,6),
[v1PTypeO] int,
[v1labelformat] nvarchar(4000),
[v2id] bigint,
[v2customerid] bigint,
[v2puid] bigint,
[v2delid] bigint,
[v2cref] nvarchar(4000),
[v2customername] nvarchar(4000),
[v2puname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2delname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2hodate] bigint,
[v2reqdeliverydate] bigint,
[v2customerduedate] bigint,
[v2status] nvarchar(4000),
[v2numpcls] int,
[v2ordervalue] int,
[v2units] int,
[v2cityservice] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cityserviceid] bigint,
[v2customerservice] nvarchar(4000),
[v2batchno] nvarchar(4000),
[v2batchdelivery] int,
[v2costcenter] nvarchar(4000),
[v2insdate] bigint,
[v2moddate] bigint,
[v2insby] bigint,
[v2quoteid] bigint,
[v2cref2] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref3] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref4] nvarchar(4000),
[v2legacyid] bigint,
[v2migrationstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2batchid] bigint,
[v2customerserviceid] bigint,
[v2costcenterid] bigint,
[v2insbyname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2bookingcomment] nvarchar(4000),
[v2bookingreference] nvarchar(4000),
[v2bookingby] bigint,
[v2bookingconfirmname] nvarchar(4000),
[notinv2] int,
[v2legacybillcustid] bigint,
[v2legacydelivercustid] bigint,
[v2legacypickupcustid] bigint,
[v2hodatedatedate] datetime2(7),



	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/LMSV2/reconorder.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.reconorder 
GO
